onSharedElementsReady().Description: Call this method during or after the OnSharedElementsReadyListener has been received in @B_android#app#SharedElementCallback#onSharedElementsArrived_E@ to indicate that the shared elements are ready to be hidden in the source and shown in the destination Activity.

ClassDesc: Listener to be called after @B_android#app#SharedElementCallback#onSharedElementsArrived_E@ when the shared elements are ready to be hidden in the source Activity and shown in the destination Activity.
